::Perndabot/FZ::

Perndabot nods. "Allright. I'll tell Zardus."

He taps his comm and informs FZ. Perndabot then looks back at 
Darkfate. "So should I come back later when your allies are all here?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Recieving Perndabot's transmission, FZ turns around and heads back to 
the Iron Fist.
